thread.title: Paul Gauguin Cruises Announces Anniversary Sale
thread.title_full: Paul Gauguin Cruises Announces Anniversary Sale

title: Paul Gauguin Cruises Announces Anniversary Sale
text:
Paul Gauguin Cruises Announces Anniversary Sale August 17, 2015 
Luxury cruise company Paul Gauguin Cruises is celebrating its sixth anniversary with a sale on Tahiti, French Polynesia and South Pacific cruises. Travel agents booking can get discounts of up to $3,400 per person from now until Aug. 31. Discounted cruises include an 11-night sailing to Cook Islands and Society Islands on Dec. 5 and multiple seven-night sailings to Tahiti and Society Islands from December to March, 2016. For prices and to book, visit the Paul Gauguin website . 0
